tool_description: Quick NLP provides useful NLP tools, such as part of speech detection.
title: Quick NLP

api_list.name: Sentence Extraction
api_list.description: Separate sentences in paragraphs into an array of sentences

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: This is my first sentence. This is my second sentence.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com/sentence/{text}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Numeric text to number

api_list.name: Entity Detector
api_list.description: Detect what types of entity each word is, for example, organisation, money, etc.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: My name is John Smith from the USA

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com/ent/{text}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Part Of Speech Detector
api_list.description: Breakdown a sentence into it's parts of speech
api_list.code:

url = "https://quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com/pos/{text}"

    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quick-nlp.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
